Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in SunPower. This is a quick reminder that the first step towards joining our industry-leading network of dealers it to complete our partner application. To get started, simply click on this link: Fill out an application.
With SunPower you can: • Grow your business with low up-front investment • Access the best solar technology in the world • Save on inventory costs with direct to site delivery • Offer a wide range of financing options for homeowners • Leverage the most advanced and proven marketing, training and support programs in the industry If you are interested in learning more, please fill out an application and we’ll get back to you shortly.
We thank you for your time and interest.
SunPower Customer Care Team Email: customercare@sunpowercorp.com Phone: 1-800-SUNPOWER (1-800-786-7693) www.sunpowercorp.com
